tv.freewheel.renderers.interfaces

Interface IRenderer


  • public interface IRenderer
    Interface for renderer to implement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Notify the renderer to dispose and release resources.
      double getDuration()
      Get duration of the ad.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getModuleInfo()
      Get module info.
      double getPlayheadTime()
      Get playheadTime of the ad.
      void load(IRendererContext rendererContext)
      Notify the renderer to initialize and to load the creative.

      Notify the renderer to start pause playback.

      This method will be invoked when player changes the size of temporal ad container.

      Notify the renderer to start resume playback.

      Set the ad playback volume on the renderer

      Notify the renderer to start ad playback.
      void stop()
      Notify the renderer to stop ad playback.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        void load(IRendererContext rendererContext)
        Notify the renderer to initialize and to load the creative.
        Parameters:
        rendererContext - reference to IRendererContext Note:
        AdManager expect the EVENT_AD_LOADED be dispatched when load staff done.

      • start

        void start()
        Notify the renderer to start ad playback. Note:
        AdManager expect the EVENT_AD_STARTED be dispatched when ad showed on UI.

      • pause

        void pause()
        Notify the renderer to start pause playback. Note:
        AdManager expect the EVENT_AD_PAUSE be dispatched when ad paused.

      • resume

        void resume()
        Notify the renderer to start resume playback. Note:
        AdManager expect the EVENT_AD_RESUME be dispatched when ad resumed.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Notify the renderer to stop ad playback. Usage: AdManager expect the EVENT_AD_STOPPED be dispatched when ad complete stopped.

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Notify the renderer to dispose and release resources. Note:
        After this call AdManager will not use this renderer anymore.

      • getDuration

        double getDuration()
        Get duration of the ad.
        Returns:
        a number in seconds, which is greater than or equal to 0, but if not available return -1

      • getPlayheadTime

        double getPlayheadTime()
        Get playheadTime of the ad.
        Returns:
        a number in seconds, which is greater than or equal to 0, but if not available return -1

      • getModuleInfo

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getModuleInfo()
        Get module info. The returned dictionary should contain key INFO_KEY_MODULE_TYPE with enumerated IConstants.ModuleType string value.

      • resize

        void resize()
        This method will be invoked when player changes the size of temporal ad container. This will also be invoked when player changes the temporal ad container to another one, which is returned by ISlot.getBase(). Renderer should change the ad size according to the new display base via slot.getWidth() and slot.getHeight().

      • setVolume

        void setVolume(float value)
        Set the ad playback volume on the renderer
        Parameters:
        value - A float in the range of [0,1]
